title: Account Transferring
body:
Hello,

I am wanting to transfer my OCE account to the NA server but there doesn't appear to be any option to do this under 'Account' in the store.

Could someone please assist on this?

Cheers

replies.body: OCE outbound transfers are currently unavailable.  We can help you manually, though!  Make sure you have the RP, and hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!

Hi Porocles,

Thanks for your speedy reply!

Can you please advise of the price of a transfer? Was it 3150RP?

Cheers,
YellowFL
Yup!  2600 RP for a one way transfer!  More info is available as well in our [Transfer FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751924-Account-Transfer-FAQ)!
